elementValueMap.apiname:
=IF(
    ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountNumber%),
    "bankAccountNumber",
    IF(
        ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountCurrency%),
        "bankAccountCurrency",
        IF(
            ISBLANK(%data:policyData:childChannelRequestCode%),
            "childChannelRequestCode",
            IF(
                (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == false && ISBLANK(%data:policyData:firstInstallmentPaid%)),
                "firstInstallmentPaid",
                IF(
                    ISBLANK(%data:policyData:sFQuoteId%),
                    "sFQuoteId",
                    IF(
                        ISBLANK(%data:policyData:salesDate%),
                        "saleDate",
                        IF(
                            ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountType%),
                            "bankAccountType",
                            IF(
                                ISBLANK(%data:policyData:channelRequestCode%),
                                "channelRequestCode",
                                IF(
                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCityCode%),
                                    "insuredCityCode",
                                    IF(
                                        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredStateCode%),
                                        "insuredStateCode",
                                        IF(
                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredDepartmentCode%),
                                            "insuredDepartmentCode",
                                            IF(
                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredEmail%),
                                                "insuredEmail",
                                                IF(
                                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredPersonType%),
                                                    "insuredPersonType",
                                                        IF(
                                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredMaritalStatus%),
                                                            "insuredMaritalStatus",
                                                            IF(
                                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredRestDirection%),
                                                                "insuredRestDirection",
                                                                IF(
                                                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredNationality%),
                                                                    "insuredNationality",
                                                                    IF(
                                                                        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sentPolicyViaEmail%),
                                                                        "sentPolicyViaEmail",
                                                                        IF(
                                                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCountryResidence%),
                                                                            "insuredCountryResidence",
                                                                            IF(
                                                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredGender%),
                                                                                "insuredGender",
                                                                                IF(ISBLANK(%settings:serviceName%),
                                                                                "serviceName",
                                                                                IF(%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:personalInformationAuthorization%),"personalInformationAuthorization",
                                                                                IF(%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sharingInformationAuthorization%),"sharingInformationAuthorization",$Vlocity.null))
                                                                                )
                                                                            )
                                                                        )
                                                                    )
                                                                )
                                                            )
                                                        )
                                                )
                                            )
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
elementValueMap.key:
=IF(
    ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountNumber%) || ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountType%),
    "obligatorio",
    IF(
        ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountCurrency%),
        "obligatorio",
        IF(
            ISBLANK(%data:policyData:childChannelRequestCode%),
            "obligatorio",
            IF(
                (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == false && ISBLANK(%data:policyData:firstInstallmentPaid%)),
                "obligatorio",
                IF(
                    ISBLANK(%data:policyData:sFQuoteId%),
                    "obligatorio",
                    IF(
                        ISBLANK(%data:policyData:salesDate%),
                        "obligatorio",
                            IF(
                                ISBLANK(%data:policyData:channelRequestCode%),
                                "obligatorio",
                                IF(
                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCityCode%),
                                    "obligatorio",
                                    IF(
                                        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredStateCode%),
                                        "obligatorio",
                                        IF(
                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredDepartmentCode%),
                                            "obligatorio",
                                            IF(
                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredEmail%),
                                                "obligatorio",
                                                IF(
                                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredPersonType%),
                                                    "obligatorio",
                                                        IF(
                                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredMaritalStatus%),
                                                            "obligatorio",
                                                            IF(
                                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredRestDirection%),
                                                                "obligatorio",
                                                                IF(
                                                                    ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredNationality%),
                                                                    "obligatorio",
                                                                    IF(
                                                                        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sentPolicyViaEmail%),
                                                                        "obligatorio",
                                                                        IF(
                                                                            ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCountryResidence%),
                                                                            "obligatorio",
                                                                            IF(
                                                                                ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredGender%),
                                                                                "obligatorio",
                                                                                IF(ISBLANK(%settings:serviceName%),
                                                                                "obligatorio",
                                                                                IF(%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:personalInformationAuthorization%),"obligatorio",
                                                                                IF(%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sharingInformationAuthorization%),"obligatorio",$Vlocity.null))
                                                                                )
                                                                            )
                                                                        )
                                                                    )
                                                                )
                                                            )
                                                        )
                                                )
                                            )
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )

PropertySetConfig.executionConditionalFormula: ISBLANK(%settings%) OR %settings% == "{}" OR ISBLANK(%settings:serviceName%) OR ISBLANK(%data%) OR %data% == "{}" OR (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == false && ISBLANK(%data:policyData:channelRequestCode%)) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:sFQuoteId%) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:salesDate%) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountType%) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountNumber%) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:bankAccountCurrency%) OR ISBLANK(%data:policyData:childChannelRequestCode%) OR (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == false && ISBLANK(%data:policyData:firstInstallmentPaid%)) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredGender%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCityCode%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredNationality%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredStateCode%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredDepartmentCode%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredRestDirection%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sentPolicyViaEmail%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredEmail%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredPersonType%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredCountryResidence%) OR ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:insuredMaritalStatus%) OR (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:personalInformationAuthorization%)) OR (%SV_CheckProduct:televentas% == true && ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:sharingInformationAuthorization%))
PropertySetConfig.label: SetValues18
